name: The Shadow of Devilwood - Adfree
description:
"The shadow of devil-wood" is a new mystery, point n click, adventure, puzzle game. Play as a detective Linwood to find her missing lover Beatrice Olson. Olson has gone for a quest in the jungle but has missing and detective(you) have to find her out.

Because, jungle has curse of black powers, there is a wizard in the jungle who is here to prevent the curse of black powers from spreading all over the world. Detective(you) have to avoid the curse of black powers in your adventure and quest to find the missing Olson.

Beautiful adventures, mind-storming Puzzles, quests and awesome riddles are waiting for you. The game is like a journey of mysterious adventure. In which sometime you have to face riddles, sometime puzzles, quests and sometime simple but engaging and interesting game play. Because, if you get stuck, there is a well managed hint system in the game. You may get help from the hint system to solve that situation.

One more interesting thing is coin collection thing in the game. This retro style coin will give you extra points or rewards. You don't have to just collect the coins but you can share your progress on the Facebook to show your friends or competitors.
